name: pnp-devproxy-paypal-random-errors
title: Simulate random errors on PayPal APIs
shortDescription: This sample contains a preset to simulate random errors on PayPal APIs. Sample errors are modeled after the information from the official PayPal Postman collection.
longDescription: This sample contains a preset to simulate random errors on PayPal APIs. Sample errors are modeled after the information from the official PayPal Postman collection.

thumbnails.alt: Dev Proxy simulating errors on PayPal APIs

references.name: Get started with the Dev Proxy
references.description: The tutorial will introduce you to the Dev Proxy and show you how to use its features.

references.name: Use preset configurations
references.description: Instructions on how to configure the Dev Proxy to use a different configuration file.

references.name: Test my app with random errors
references.description: How to test your app with random errors
